short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Template Factory is a mapping of specific HTML elements to the certificate generation system.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
zkPass Template Factory: Template is a mapping of specific HTML elements to the certificate generation system. Through Template, users can select target data sources and personalized fields according to business needs, and seamlessly integrate them into the zkPass protocol.

How TransGate Works: Open the data source website of your choice using the zkPass Template Factory, browse the web page information you see, and then submit the hidden data structure information to the server.

Key Features:
API Matching: Automatically select APIs that meet the criteria and proactively conceal data information, retaining only the data structure information.

With zkPass Template Factory, you can:
Provide the data source information you select and receive the corresponding reward.

The template tool is a client tool developed to expand more and more valuable data sources. Users can easily provide the desensitized data structure through this tool, and the zkPass protocol will perform zero-knowledge processing on the valuable private data in the structure.

Embrace a new era of data ownership. Join the Web3 movement today. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the zkPass Template Factory Chrome extension!
